sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {FormGroup, FormControl} from '@angular/forms' import {Hero} from '../../Models/hero' import {HeroesService} from '../../service/heroes.service' @Component({ selector: 'app-heroes', templateUrl: './heroes.component.html', styleUrls: ['./heroes.component.css'] }) export class HeroesComponent { hero: Hero; newHeroForm: FormGroup; constructor(private heroService: HeroesService) { this.hero = new Hero(); this.newHeroForm = new FormGroup( {name: new FormControl(null), height: new FormControl(null), origin: new FormControl(null), skills: new FormControl(null)} ) } onSubmit(){ console.log(this.newHeroForm) console.log(this.hero) this.heroService.addHero(this.hero) } }

heroes works!
